Amelia Bennett (1914-2002) bụ onye America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na ndị otu Gee's Bend quilting collective. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston ma Tinye ya na nchịkọta nke Dallas Museum of Art.
A mụrụ Bennett ma zụlite ya na Wilcox Corner, mpaghara Hazel, Alabama, site na Fannie T
Ọ malitere ịkwa akwa n'okpuru nkuzi nne ya mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Ọ zutere di ya, Willie Earl Bennett, na 1935 ma ha lụrụ ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị
Ha zụlitere ụmụ atọ, gụnyere otu ónyé na-eme akwa, Sally Bennett Jones.
